title: Context Management System
content:
The Context Management System is the core architecture enabling SkogAI agents to operate with task-specific focus rather than capacity limitations.

Key principles:
- Context is TASK-SPECIFIC, not capacity-limited
- 8k token limit enforces focused context
- File visibility dynamically filtered by current task
- Must scale from 0.2k to 200k+ tokens

The hierarchical structure uses:
- active/: Current working context (symlinked)
- project-specific/: Isolated project contexts
- shared/: Cross-project knowledge
- global/: System-wide settings
summary: Core architecture for task-specific context filtering across all agents
